statements: SELECT * FROM customer_visits;
SELECT customer_id, store_id FROM customer_visits ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(visit_id) AS max_visit_id FROM customer_visits;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM customer_visits GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_visits WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_visits WHERE visit_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, store_id, visit_date FROM customer_visits WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS number_of_visits FROM customer_visits GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY number_of_visits DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT store_id FROM customer_visits WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), visit_date)) AS avg_days_since_last_visit FROM customer_visits;
SELECT * FROM customer_visits
SELECT customer_id, visit_date FROM customer_visits WHERE store_location_id = 1
SELECT store_name, city, state FROM store_locations WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT visit_id, customer_id, store_location_id, visit_date FROM customer_visits ORDER BY visit_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_visits WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY visit_date
SELECT visit_id, customer_id, store_location_id, visit_date FROM customer_visits WHERE visit_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT store_name, city, state FROM store_locations WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT customer_id, store_name, city, visit_date FROM customer_visits JOIN store_locations ON customer_visits.store_location_id = store_locations.store_location_id WHERE visit_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_visits WHERE customer_id = 123 AND store_location_id = 2;
SELECT store_location_id, store_name, city, state FROM store_locations ORDER BY store_name DESC, city ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_visits;
SELECT customer_id, store_id, visit_date FROM customer_visits WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, store_id, visit_date FROM customer_visits WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT store_name, location, manager_name FROM store_locations WHERE store_type = 'Retail';
SELECT feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM customer_visits WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT visit_id, visit_date, visit_duration FROM customer_visits WHERE store_id = 200 ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT store_name, location, manager_name FROM store_locations WHERE store_type = 'Grocery' ORDER BY store_name ASC;
SELECT visit_id, feedback_text, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4;
SELECT visit_id, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM CustomerVisits;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM Customers;
SELECT store_name, store_location FROM Stores;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_gender FROM Customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, visit_date FROM Customers JOIN CustomerVisits ON Customers.customer_id = CustomerVisits.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerVisits WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM Customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT store_name, store_location FROM Stores WHERE store_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM MarketResearch WHERE research_topic = 'Customer Satisfaction';
SELECT C.customer_name, S.store_name, MV.visit_date FROM Customers C JOIN CustomerVisits MV ON C.customer_id = MV.customer_id JOIN Stores S ON S.store_id = MV.store_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_visits;
SELECT customer_id, visit_date FROM customer_visits WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT store_name, store_location FROM stores WHERE store_manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_visits WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT store_name, store_location, store_manager FROM stores WHERE store_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE category_id = 4;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM categories WHERE category_id = 5;
